help:
Welcome to the "Escape from Hacker Hotel!!!" challenge. You are locked in the hotel, just like servants of the pharaohs were locked in the Pyramids with their masters. You will need to hack yourself a way out of the hotel before the end of the weekend (when the hotel will be closed up forever, WHOAHAHAHAHAHAHA)! h or ? show this help q quit the game for now x leave a room or enter the elevator e enter the given room l look around the room l look at object o open object p pickup item (you can only carry 2 items at a time) d drop item (you can only carry 2 items at a time) i list items you are carrying t

talk to "person"

u use object u use item on object You can use any substring of an object, item, room etc in any case. So 'e rec' will enter the reception, just as 'enter Reception'.

game.name: The Street
game.desc:
You stand in front of Hotel Pyramide, an Egyptian styled
boutique hotel. There is a Hacker Conference going on at the hotel.
game.action_str1: Hahaha, you are trying to talk to a hotel!
game.open_acl_msg: No no no, you can't leave this hotel. You are locked in forever.

o.name: The Hotel Lobby
o.desc: You are in the lobby of our beautiful hotel "The Pyramid". Here you can find our reception, the hotel bar and a shop. On your right you can find the elevator to all the rooms and on the left is of course the entrance through which you came in.

o.name: A Receptionist
o.action_acl_msg: I'm sorry sir, I'm only allowed to check out VIP guests.
o.action_str1: Here you go Sir, everything is settled.

o.name: Keycard
o.desc: This looks like a VIP keycard
o.action_msg: You succesfully copied the VIP keycard
o.state_desc: Access granted to the second floor

o.name: Keycard-Copy
o.desc: A copy of the VIP keycard

o.name: Proxmark III
o.desc: The Proxmark is an RFID swiss-army tool, allowing for both high and low level interactions with the vast majority of RFID tags and systems world-wide.

o.name: The Elevator
o.desc: The elevator will take you to any floor you like
o.action_acl_msg: You don't have a VIP keycard, access denied
o.action_msg: VIP access to second floor granted.

o.name: The First Floor Hallway
o.desc: This the hallway on the First Floor
o.open_acl_msg: Access to this floor is for hotel guests only!

o.name: The Second Floor
o.desc: This is the hallway on the Second Floor
o.open_acl_msg: This floor is for VIP guests only!

o.name: The Dungeon
o.desc:
It is dark in here, get into a dark area so your eyes will adjust to the light...
...or you will not see anything
